commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Thank you for your patience, little demons! Tonight, I bring to you Fallen Angel Cooking! Take in the waves of darkness that emerge from my recipes!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh. Sorry, Yoshiko. You weren't in frame just now.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Come on! How could you miss that?! I really nailed that part. And it's Yohane!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry. I was just thinking the angle wasn't the best. If we're gonna film this, I wanna make sure to get all your fallen angel charms perfectly on camera.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: R-Really? Well if you put it that way, I suppose you couldn't help it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It might be better to secure the camera onto a tripod than for me to hold it, so it won't be unsteady that way.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hmm, you're right. How about we change the set a little? The table is fine as it is, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup! I'll set up the camera here since I think it's better to shoot head-on. Uh-huh, looking good.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: The portable gas stove is set up! The pot is bubbling! I've got my devilish seasonings, Tears of a Fallen Angel, little devil temptations... That's everything.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry for the holdup! Let's get the camera rolling then!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Oh, wait! I need to do my voice training exercises... Ahem. Ahhh, ahhh, Yohane descends! Ahhh, ahem!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Three, two, one, action!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Thank you for your patience, little demons! Tonight, I bring to you Fallen Angel Cooking! Take in the waves of darkness that emerge from my recipes!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh heh... The fallen of your caliber would not normally be able to feast their eyes on what I will be presenting as a special treat tonight!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I will be adding devilish whispers, fallen angel wings, and little devil temptations to this black cauldron of hell filled with white wings and beasts of the wild!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Cauldron of hell...? Oh, she means her pot! The white wings are Chinese cabbage, and the beasts of the wild is pork... I don't know about the other stuff. Seasonings, maybe?)

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: And now! To seal the powers so pure! Devils, fallen angels, imps, dance in throes of ecstasy for me! Mwahahaha! Take that!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (She's shaking three bottles into the pot like mad... Some really wacky-colored powder is... Oh no! Yoshiko's hand!)

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Ah, ack!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yoshiko, show me your hand!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Huh?! Oh, uh, r-right...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A-Are you okay?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Oh, uh, yeah. I pulled my hand away immediately, so...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It's okay. I was just a little surprised. Wait, hang on! Why are you holding my hand so tightly?! I just glanced the pot, that's all.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, yeah... But I was startled since you grimaced in pain. I'm really worried about you, so let me take a look at it!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Wh-What's the big idea grabbing my hand like that out of nowhere? You caught me off guard.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Come on... You can't just grab my hand like that. It's not fair that I'm the only one whose heart's racing right now...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Did you say something? Is it starting to hurt now?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: No, I'm okay. It doesn't hurt. Um... Thanks for your concern.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It's not so bad having you around, you know.
